channel.title: [PI] Smelting -x10, x5

item.title: [PI] Smelting -x10, x5
item.dc:creator: @sketzo sketzo
item.description:
@sketzo wrote:

So i’m trying to get smelt x10 and x5 to work. But it isn’t working… Code:

This is rune smelting

case 29026: if (c.smeltInterface) { c.smeltType = 2363; c.smeltAmount = 1; c.getSmithing().startSmelting(c.smeltType); } break; case 29025://smelt 5 if (c.smeltInterface) { c.smeltType = 2363; c.smeltAmount = 5; c.getSmithing().startSmelting(c.smeltType); } break; case 29024://smelt 10 if (c.smeltInterface) { c.smeltType = 2363; c.smeltAmount = 10; c.getSmithing().startSmelting(c.smeltType); } break;

Pressing smelt 5 or smelt 10, then it smelts only 1.

Read full topic
